00022 #ifndef HYPERTABLE_MAINTENANCEQUEUE_H
00023 #define HYPERTABLE_MAINTENANCEQUEUE_H
00024 
00025 #include <cassert>
00026 
00027 #include "MaintenanceTask.h"
00028 
00029 namespace Hypertable {
00030 
00033   class MaintenanceQueue : public ReferenceCount {
00034 
00035     struct ltMaintenanceTask {
00036       bool operator()(const MaintenanceTask *sm1, const MaintenanceTask *sm2) const {
00037         return xtime_cmp(sm1->start_time, sm2->start_time) >= 0;
00038       }
00039     };
00040 
00041     typedef std::priority_queue<MaintenanceTask *, std::vector<MaintenanceTask *>, ltMaintenanceTask> MaintenanceQueueT;
00042 
00043     class MaintenanceQueueState {
00044     public:
00045       MaintenanceQueueState() : shutdown(false) { return; }
00046       MaintenanceQueueT  queue;
00047       boost::mutex       mutex;
00048       boost::condition   cond;
00049       bool               shutdown;
00050     };
00051 
00052     class Worker {
00053 
00054     public:
00055 
00056       Worker(MaintenanceQueueState &state) : m_state(state) { return; }
00057 
00058       void operator()() {
00059         boost::xtime now, next_work;
00060         MaintenanceTask *task = 0;
00061 
00062         while (true) {
00063 
00064           {
00065             boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_state.mutex);
00066 
00067             boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00068 
00069             while (m_state.queue.empty() || xtime_cmp((m_state.queue.top())->start_time, now) > 0) {
00070 
00071               if (m_state.shutdown)
00072                 return;
00073 
00074               if (m_state.queue.empty())
00075                 m_state.cond.wait(lock);
00076               else {
00077                 next_work = (m_state.queue.top())->start_time;
00078                 m_state.cond.timed_wait(lock, next_work);
00079               }
00080               boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00081             }
00082 
00083             task = m_state.queue.top();
00084             m_state.queue.pop();
00085           }
00086 
00087           try {
00088             task->execute();
00089           }
00090           catch(Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00091             HT_ERRORF("%s (%s)", Error::get_text(e.code()), e.what());
00092           }
00093 
00094           delete task;
00095         }
00096       }
00097 
00098     private:
00099       MaintenanceQueueState &m_state;
00100     };
00101 
00102     MaintenanceQueueState  m_state;
00103     boost::thread_group    m_threads;
00104     bool joined;
00105 
00106   public:
00107 
00114     MaintenanceQueue(int worker_count) : joined(false) {
00115       Worker Worker(m_state);
00116       assert (worker_count > 0);
00117       for (int i=0; i<worker_count; ++i)
00118         m_threads.create_thread(Worker);
00119       //threads
00120     }
00121 
00127     void shutdown() {
00128       m_state.shutdown = true;
00129       m_state.cond.notify_all();
00130     }
00131 
00136     void join() {
00137       if (!joined) {
00138         m_threads.join_all();
00139         joined = true;
00140       }
00141     }
00142 
00149     void add(MaintenanceTask *task) {
00150       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_state.mutex);
00151       m_state.queue.push(task);
00152       m_state.cond.notify_one();
00153     }
00154   };
00155   typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<MaintenanceQueue> MaintenanceQueuePtr;
00156 
00157 }
